statements: SELECT * FROM employee_schedule WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT schedule_date, start_time FROM employee_schedule WHERE schedule_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, start_time FROM employee_schedule WHERE end_time < '18:00:00';
SELECT DISTINCT schedule_date FROM employee_schedule;
SELECT * FROM employee_schedule ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_schedule WHERE employee_id = 100 ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, start_time, end_time FROM employee_schedule WHERE schedule_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_time;
SELECT employee_id, schedule_date, start_time, end_time FROM employee_schedule WHERE start_time < '12:00:00' AND end_time > '15:00:00' ORDER BY employee_id, schedule_date;
SELECT DISTINCT schedule_date FROM employee_schedule WHERE employee_id IN (101, 102, 103) ORDER BY schedule_date;
SELECT COUNT(employee_id) AS total_employees, MAX(end_time) AS latest_end_time FROM employee_schedule;
SELECT * FROM employee_schedule WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, schedule_date FROM employee_schedule WHERE schedule_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM employee_payroll WHERE total_hours_worked > 40;
SELECT employee_id, salary FROM employee_payroll ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT employee_id, payment_date, total_hours_worked FROM employee_payroll WHERE total_hours_worked < 20;
SELECT * FROM employee_schedule WHERE schedule_date = '2022-10-10';
SELECT employee_id, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM employee_schedule WHERE employee_id = 1001 ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, salary FROM employee_payroll WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT employee_id, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM employee_schedule WHERE schedule_date > '2022-01-01' AND schedule_date < '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM employee_payroll ORDER BY salary DESC, employee_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM employee_schedule WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM employee_schedule ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, bonuses FROM payroll_information WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT employee_id, performance_rating FROM performance_data WHERE feedback IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM payroll_information JOIN performance_data ON payroll_information.employee_id = performance_data.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employee_schedule ORDER BY schedule_date ASC, shift_start_time DESC
SELECT employee_id, salary + bonuses - deductions AS total_pay FROM payroll_information WHERE salary >= 50000
SELECT * FROM performance_data WHERE performance_rating >= 4.0 AND feedback IS NOT NULL
SELECT employee_id, CONCAT_WS(' ', employee_id, performance_rating) AS employee_rating FROM performance_data
SELECT employee_id, schedule_date, TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, shift_start_time, shift_end_time) AS hours_worked FROM employee_schedule
SELECT * FROM EmployeeSchedule;
SELECT EmployeeID, ScheduleDate, StartTime, EndTime FROM EmployeeSchedule WHERE EmployeeID = 1001;
SELECT ScheduleDate, StartTime, EndTime FROM EmployeeSchedule ORDER BY ScheduleDate DESC;
SELECT EmployeeID, Salary FROM PayrollInfo WHERE Salary > 50000;
SELECT EmployeeID, PerformanceDate, PerformanceScore FROM PerformanceData WHERE PerformanceScore >= 90;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeSchedule ORDER BY ScheduleDate DESC, StartTime ASC
SELECT ID, FullName, Position FROM Employee WHERE Department = 'HR'
SELECT EmployeeID, SUM(Salary) AS TotalSalary FROM PayrollInfo GROUP BY EmployeeID HAVING TotalSalary > 5000
SELECT e.FullName, p.PerformanceScore FROM Employee e JOIN PerformanceData p ON e.EmployeeID = p.EmployeeID WHERE p.PerformanceDate BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT ScheduleDate, StartTime, EndTime FROM EmployeeSchedule WHERE EmployeeID = (SELECT EmployeeID FROM Employee WHERE Position = 'Manager')
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT id, name, position FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT name, position FROM employees WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT id, date, start_time, end_time FROM schedules ORDER BY date DESC, start_time ASC;
SELECT employee_id, salary, bonus FROM payroll WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, department FROM employees WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT e.name, s.date, p.salary FROM employees e JOIN schedules s ON e.id = s.employee_id JOIN payroll p ON e.id = p.employee_id WHERE p.salary > 50000;
SELECT * FROM payroll ORDER BY salary DESC, bonus DESC;
SELECT e.name AS employee_name, p.rating AS performance_rating FROM employees e JOIN performance p ON e.id = p.employee_id WHERE p.rating >= 4;
